name: Kosmos

name: GpsPrune
description: Editor de pistas (tracks), analizador, creador y conversor.

name: OsmAnd
description:
Navigation (routing) offline and online, OSM and custom map display (vector data or tiles, offline, cached or online), POI and address search (offline or online Nominatim), submit OSM bugs and POI, mark favorites, public transport info. Actively being developed.

Keywords: GPS navigator, GPS navigation, navigation system, satellite navigation, sat nav, satnav, GPS tracker, GPS tracking, GPS map, OpenStreetMap, OSM viewer, map viewer, OSM mapping, offline routing, offline world map, global offline country maps, outdoor.
author: Victor Shcherb and contributors

name: QGIS
description: a free, multiplatform GIS application.

name: Merkaartor
description: Buen editor con estilos.

name: Overpass turbo
description: Una herramienta web de filtrado de datos para OpenStreetMap que usa la API de Overpass.

name: OSMTracker for Android

name: WhereAreYouGoing GPS Tracking

name: Open Route Service
description: Easy to use, nice UI.

name: mkgmap
description: Crea mapas OSM para dispositivos Garmin.

name: MapSwipe
description: Forma supersimple de contribución a la cartografía humanitaria (indirectamente) ayudando a encontrar características (features) sobre el terreno en imágenes.

name: Level0
description: Editor de datos de OSM basado en web.

name: HistOSM
description: Muestra POIs con trasfondo histórico sobre un mapa de OSM.

name: OpenStreetMap-in-a-Box (osminabox)

name: RawEditor
description: Webfrontend to edit OSM XML directly.
